== Understand ==
Manama emerged as the capital of independent Bahrain after periods of domination by Portugal and Persians
In 1862, Manama consisted of ruins and pearl fishermen's shacks; the port was closed and its merchants had moved elsewhere
The Gateway of Bahrain, located in the Customs Square in Central Manama
